title: Papyrus Fragments Inscribed in Demotic or Greek
description:
Fragment a: Two fragmentary columns of text, the first comprising of about 28 lines of text, the second or about 31 lines of text. The papyrus is fragmentary with a number of lacunae. Apparently an omen text.
Fragment b:  Recto has 9 lines of text in Demotic: narrative text, perhaps a romance.  	Verso has 8 lines in Greek: fragment of a land survey or taxation list.
credit_line: Bequest of Theodora Wilbour from the collection of her father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
